summary: This 19th century collection contains print and decorative fonts, even for embroidery.

summary: The German letterpress typeface is better known today as Fraktur (black letter or gothic font)

summary: Neben den Schriftmustern soll dieses Blog auch andere interessante typographische Fundstücke präsentieren, dies ist das Erste. Dieses Buch wurde in der Ehmcke Antiqua gesetzt.
title: Sonderbund Denkschrift

summary: This collection is also interesting because of the example words chosen.
title: Moderne Lateinschriften

summary: Right on time for Friday the 13th there are two invoices from 1910, the headers are particularly nice to look at, but the mixture of different fonts also reminds the dark days of Microsoft WordArt at the end of the 90s.
title: Rechnungen

summary: Since the Advent season begin: The Christmas story in woodcuts.
title: Die Weihnachtsgeschichte

summary: This collection of scripts was published for the nibs of the company [Brause & Co] ( https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brause_ (company)) (in German only), Iserlohn.
title: Alphabete

summary: Today a piece of fabric. Font designs for embroidery have already been shown here, now a cross-stitched font from 1909.
title: Stickmuster

summary: The backs of two Christmas postcards.
title: Postkarten

summary: This 19th century collection contains writing print and decorative fonts, even for embroidery.
title: Alphabete und Zierschriften

summary: A new single find, a post card for New year’s eve. It’s rather kitschy and very likely older than the postmark suggests. This is supported by the execution as a lithograph and the motif …
title: Viel Glück und Freude im Neuen Jahre

summary: The letterpress typeface is better known today as Fraktur (black letter or gothic font)

summary: Scenes from daily life at the time as letters.

summary: This collection includes the Gothic fonts from the type foundry D. Stempel Aktien-Gesellschaft, Frankfurt, from around 1930.

summary: Metal letters for business or delivery vans - also available gold-plated - are now rarely found in modern cities.

summary: This time not a printing fonts, but at least a Fraktur variant. More examples for poster and sign painters will be published in the future…

summary: The back of the ‘Die deutsche Zeitung ihr Werden, Wesen und Wirken’ offers a type specimen from the type foundry D. Stempel.
